Posted By: JackTheStripper (10/13/2011 10:13:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Gelzo, [Trollhide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Trollhide) gives regen, but nothing else in M12. In current standard, there's not much else. [Skithiryx](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skithiryx) needs one more damage to die, as does [Molten Tail Masticore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Molten Tail Masticore). [Thrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thrun) is protected. The most important function is against elf decks featuring [Ezuri](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ezuri).  
  
Broadly though, I agree, either print more creatures with regen or don't use cards with non-regen clauses. I'd have thought it'd be part of simplifying the core sets which Wizards talks about so much.
posts.html:
@Gelzo, Trollhide gives regen, but nothing else in M12. In current standard, there's not much else. Skithiryx needs one more damage to die, as does Molten Tail Masticore. Thrun is protected. The most important function is against elf decks featuring Ezuri.

Broadly though, I agree, either print more creatures with regen or don't use cards with non-regen clauses. I'd have thought it'd be part of simplifying the core sets which Wizards talks about so much.

posts.post_content:
Dear [Chandra Nalaar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra Nalaar),  
  
We would like to thank you for your efforts as Chief of Red Flavor Text since hiring you in 2009. We understand that it is a difficult project to toss out pithy one-liners whenever you ignite, burn, or otherwise send a person, object or location up in smoke. It is therefore with regret that we must inform you that our reviews of your performance have not been favorable, compared to the industry standards set by your predecessor, [Jaya Ballard, Task Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jaya Ballard, Task Mage). As such, it is with heavy hearts that we must ask for your resignation.  
  
Sincerely,  
The MTG Flavor QC Team  
  
*This message was rush-delivered by [Voice of Law](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voice of Law) Courier Services.
